tool_description: Determines optimal way to split orders across multiple warehouses when single-warehouse fulfillment is not possible.

max_splits.description: Maximum number of shipments to create

minimize_splits.description: Prioritize fewer shipments over other optimization factors

customer_preference.description: Customer preference: speed, cost, or consolidated

error_messages: SKU quantity mismatch: Number of SKUs must match number of quantities.
Invalid inventory format: Inventory data must be in format 'warehouse_id:sku:quantity'.
Insufficient inventory: Total available inventory is less than requested quantities.
Invalid max splits: Must be between 1 and 5.
Invalid customer preference: Must be one of: speed, cost, consolidated.
Invalid quantities: All quantities must be positive integers.
usage: Provide product_skus, quantities, and warehouse_inventory data. Optionally set max_splits, minimize_splits, and customer_preference to control splitting behavior.

unfulfillable_items.description: Items that cannot be fulfilled due to insufficient inventory
